1.content: This chocolate lava cake recipe changed my life! Perfect texture.

2.content: How long did you bake yours? Mine came out too runny.

3.content: Exactly 12 minutes at 375°F. Use a toothpick test!

4.content: Has anyone tried substituting almond flour in the cheesecake recipe?

5.content: Yes! Use 1:1 ratio but add 1 extra egg for binding.

6.content: The tiramisu looks divine! What coffee brand do you recommend?

7.content: Illy or Lavazza work best for authentic Italian flavor.

8.content: My macarons always crack. Any troubleshooting tips?

9.content: Let the piped shells rest for 45 mins before baking!

10.content: Also check your oven temp with a thermometer.

11.content: Best crème brûlée I've ever made! Torch technique was perfect.

12.content: How thick was your sugar layer? Mine caramelized unevenly.

13.content: Pavlova newbie here - why did mine collapse after cooling?

14.content: Did you open the oven door while baking? That's usually the culprit.

15.content: The vegan brownies are surprisingly fudgy! What's your secret?

16.content: Black beans instead of flour! Sounds weird but works magic.

17.content: Can the panna cotta be made with agar-agar instead of gelatin?

18.content: Yes! Use 1 tsp agar powder per 2 cups liquid.

19.content: Note: Agar sets firmer than gelatin. Reduce by 20% for similar texture.

20.content: My lemon tart filling curdled. Help!

21.content: Temper your eggs slowly next time - pour hot liquid in a thin stream.

22.content: The salted caramel sauce is perfect for gifting! How long does it keep?

23.content: 2 weeks refrigerated, or freeze for 3 months.

24.content: Has anyone made the baklava with pistachios only?

25.content: I did! Toast them first for deeper flavor.

26.content: Great tip! Did you adjust the syrup amount?

27.content: The flourless cake sank in the middle. Overmixed?

28.content: More likely underbaked. Try 5 extra minutes next time.

29.content: Can I use frozen berries for the clafoutis?

30.content: Absolutely! No need to thaw - just bake 5 mins longer.

31.content: The churros recipe says to pipe with a star tip - is this mandatory?

32.content: Yes! The ridges help them crisp evenly.

33.content: My mousse au chocolat won't stiffen. Whipping cream problem?

34.content: Chill your bowl and beaters first! Also check cream fat % (needs 35%+).

35.content: The poached pears recipe saved my dinner party! Elegant yet easy.

36.content: What wine did you use for poaching?

37.content: A cheap but drinkable Pinot Noir worked perfectly!

38.content: The soufflé rose beautifully but then immediately deflated. Normal?

39.content: Totally normal - they're meant to be eaten immediately!

40.content: The mango sorbet was icy. How to make it creamier?
